Payments:
Payments are accepted via PayPal, or a credit/debit card. Our PayPal account is a verified business account, therefore, you do not have to have a PayPal account to make your payment, all you need is a credit or debit card.

Support:
We offer a couple of different ways of getting support for any problem that may arise. You can email us using our contact form, or the suggested way for clients, logging into our Client Area to submit a support ticket. The client area is the best option because you get a much faster response, and we can better track the progress of the situation.

Questions:
If you have any questions, please feel to contact us at anytime. If you prefer, you can also PM us here! We will respond to your inquiry as quickly as possible!

Thanks for looking!
